name: Wireless Bluetooth Headphones
description: High-quality wireless Bluetooth headphones with noise-cancellation.

reviews.comment: Excellent sound quality and comfortable to wear.
Good value for the price, but battery life could be better.

name: Smartphone with 5G
description: Latest model smartphone with 5G connectivity and high-resolution camera.

reviews.comment: Amazing phone with a fantastic camera and fast performance.
Great phone, but a bit pricey.

name: Running Shoes
description: Lightweight and comfortable running shoes for all types of terrain.

reviews.comment: Comfortable shoes, but the size runs a bit small.
Perfect for my daily runs, very durable and lightweight.

name: Stainless Steel Water Bottle
description: Eco-friendly stainless steel water bottle with a 1-liter capacity.

reviews.comment: Keeps my water cold all day, highly recommend!
Good bottle, but the cap could be easier to open.

name: Yoga Mat
description: Non-slip yoga mat with extra cushioning for comfort.

reviews.comment: Perfect thickness and great grip, love it!
Good mat, but it has a slight odor when new.
